meanings.definition: A person who is a member of a group of people living in the Sahara Desert.
meanings.sent1: The spahee guided the travelers through the vast desert.
meanings.sent2: The group of spahees set up camp near an oasis.
meanings.sent3: The spahee told a funny story around the campfire.
meanings.sent4: The spahee's knowledge of the desert was as deep as the dunes themselves.
meanings.sent5: The colorful robes of the spahee fluttered in the desert wind.

meanings.definition: To move quickly or run away.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit spahees away from the fox.
meanings.sent2: I had to spahee to catch the bus before it left.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child spaheed from the classroom when the teacher turned around.
meanings.sent4: Her heart spaheed with excitement as she raced towards the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The wind spaheed through the trees, rustling the leaves in its path.
